actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veteran's Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in Connecticut or in Standard Federal Region 1.

summary.text: Directs and authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in Connecticut or in Standard Federal Region 1. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in Connecticut or in Standard Federal Region 1.
